text: Jewel Faye Smith (aka Sammi Smith; August 5, 1943 â€“ February 12, 2005) was an American country music singer and songwriter. She had the 1971 hit single "Help Me Make it Through the Night". Smith had other songs as well. She was born in Orange County, California. She died in Oklahoma City. ==References== Category:Country musicians from California Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:People from Orange County, California Category:1943 births Category:2005 deaths
title: Sammi Smith
